REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0902 reute u f BC-CPC-<CPC>-TO-SELL-UNI 03-11 0034

TEXT.TITLE: CPC <CPC> TO SELL UNIT TO HI-PORT <HIPT>
TEXT.BODY: CPC International Inc said it has agreed in principle to sell its Peterson/Puritain Inc subsidiary to Hi-Port Industries Inc. CPC said the sale is not expected to have a significant impact on its earnings and is subject to approval by boards of both companies. Terms were not disclosed. Peterson/Purittan is a contract packager of personal care and household products. Reuter
